Rachit Gupta of The Times of India rated the film Kalank 3 stars out of 5 and remarked, "Kalank is a true labour of love that tells you a story laced with beautiful moments that will tug you at your heartstrings."
Anupama Chopra of Film Companion rated Kalank with 3 stars out of 5 and opined "Kalank is likely to be the most visually stunning film of this year."

edge: The film follows the story of Zafar (Varun Dhawan), a struggling artist in pre-independence India. Set in 1945 against the backdrop of India's struggle for independence, Kalank is a drama about three families — the wealthy Chaudhury family, an ambitious jeweller family and the daughter of a debt-ridden family.
